00025 #ifndef _PHYSICS_SPATIAL_
00026 #define _PHYSICS_SPATIAL_
00027 
00028 #include <physics/physics>
00029 
00030 #include <base/ReferencedObject>
00031 #include <base/Named>
00032 #include <physics/PositionableOrientable>
00033 
00034 
00035 namespace physics {
00036 
00037 /// base class for things and collections thereof that can be positioned and oriented in 3D space
00038 class Spatial : public PositionableOrientable, virtual public base::Named, virtual public base::ReferencedObject
00039 {
00040 public:
00041   Spatial() {}
00042   Spatial(const String& name) : Named(name) {}
00043   Spatial(const Spatial& s) : Named(s), PositionableOrientable(s) {}
00044   
00045   virtual Spatial& operator=(const Spatial& s) { PositionableOrientable::operator=(s); Named::operator=(s); return *this; }
00046   
00047   virtual ~Spatial() {}
00048 };
00049   
00050 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const Spatial& s) // Output
00051 {
00052   return out << s.getName();
00053 }
00054 
00055 
00056 } // physics
00057 
00058 #endif
